item.title: White people have done good and bad things; focus on the good.
item.description: The “bad” (all across the board and for all peoples) has long-term institutional consequences that need to be addressed; only focusing on the “good” won’t help those issues get solved. Critical thinking and analyses matter, and we’re particularly focused on critical analysis that is constructive; we are seeking and acting upon solutions.
